channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo are in Sheffield to create a garden with a forest feel for couple Karen and Kathryn, lovers of the outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston visit and compete in country shows. The chefs are in Hawkshead - famous for being home to Beatrix Potter.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: It is day two of top chefs Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston's culinary road trip. They are entering the savoury tartlets category of the Wensleydale show.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: It is day three of professional chefs Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston's foodie road trip. This time they are in Glendale, inspiration for Postman Pat's Greendale.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston arrive in the north Devon fishing village of Clovelly, where they take on the locals in the Clovelly crab and lobster festival.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. Alex and Peter go down a copper mine, just a few hundred yards from their cottage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. During World War II, a commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Assassination Bureau
channel.desc: Action. Would-be journalist Sonya Winter investigates the Assassination Bureau, a mysterious organization. Ollie Reed and Diana Rigg star.
